snippet: After losing to the Rays on the final day of the season, the Orioles lost their opportunity to win the American League East and must play the wild card game on the road against the Rangers.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that, after losing to Tampa Bay Rays on the final day of the season, Baltimore Orioles lost their opportunity to win the American League East and must play the wild card game on the road against the Texas Rangers.
lead_paragraph: After losing to the Rays on the final day of the season, the Orioles lost their opportunity to win the American League East and must play the wild card game on the road against the Rangers.

headline.seo: Disappointed, Orioles Still Have a Game to Play
headline.main: Disappointed, Orioles Still Have a Game to Play
headline.print_headline: Disappointed, Orioles Still Have A Game to Play
